name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.blockreport.intervalMsec
description: Determines block reporting interval in milliseconds.

name: dfs.datanode.block.id.layout.upgrade.threads
description:
The number of threads to use when creating hard links from
    current to previous blocks during upgrade of a DataNode to block ID-based
    block layout (see HDFS-6482 for details on the layout).

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.idle.sleep.ms
description: The sleep time of DeadNodeDetector per iteration.

name: dfs.namenode.metrics.logger.period.seconds
description:
This setting controls how frequently the NameNode logs its metrics. The
    logging configuration must also define one or more appenders for
    NameNodeMetricsLog for the metrics to be logged.
    NameNode metrics logging is disabled if this value is set to zero or
    less than zero.

name: dfs.datanode.failed.volumes.tolerated
description:
The number of volumes that are allowed to
  fail before a datanode stops offering service. By default
  any volume failure will cause a datanode to shutdown.
  The value should be greater than or equal to -1 , -1 represents minimum
  1 valid volume.

name: mapreduce.job.encrypted-intermediate-data-key-size-bits
description: Mapreduce encrypt data key size default is 128

name: hadoop.fuse.connection.timeout
description:
The minimum number of seconds that we'll cache libhdfs connection objects
    in fuse_dfs. Lower values will result in lower memory consumption; higher
    values may speed up access by avoiding the overhead of creating new
    connection objects.

name: dfs.client.server-defaults.validity.period.ms
description:
The amount of milliseconds after which cached server defaults are updated.

    By default this parameter is set to 1 hour.
    Support multiple time unit suffix(case insensitive), as described
    in dfs.heartbeat.interval.
